general.name: rsFieldAssignmentsFinal
general.short: Target assignments for a particular field (version to load into targetdb)
general.description: Targets in the area around a particular field and their assignments within this field. Each entry is an entry from the carton_to_target table in targetdb and has a unique RSID. Different RSIDs can correspond to the same CATALOGID (and thus actually be the same object), but may have different desired cadence or spectrograph requirements. Produced by the robostrategy script rs_assign_final, using the tofits() method of the Field class. Can be read in by fromfits() method of the Field class. This file is the version to be loaded into targetdb.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.comment: file does conform to FITS standard
number of bits per data pixel

header.value: FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) format is defined in 'Astronomy

dark_plane dark_plane bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time bright_time

header.comment: True if this field ignores calibrations

rsassign.name: RSASSIGN
rsassign.description: Set to 0 if not to be assigned, 1 if to be assigned, 2 if an open target assignment

priority.name: PRIORITY
priority.description: priority for assignment (lower numbers assigned first)

value.name: VALUE
value.description: value to be used for cadence allocation to fields

delta_ra.name: DELTA_RA
delta_ra.description: RA offset of observation from nominal object position

delta_dec.name: DELTA_DEC
delta_dec.description: Dec offset of observation from nominal object position

catalogid.name: CATALOGID
catalogid.description: Unique id in catalog table of catalogdb

target_pk.name: TARGET_PK
target_pk.description: Primary key in target table in targetdb

magnitude.name: MAGNITUDE
magnitude.description: Array of magnitudes (g, r, i, BP, G, RP, H)

carton.name: CARTON
carton.description: Name of carton for this target

carton_pk.name: CARTON_PK
carton_pk.description: Primary key of carton for this target's carton

program.name: PROGRAM
program.description: Name of program for this target

mapper.name: MAPPER
mapper.description: Name of mapper for this target

category.name: CATEGORY
category.description: Category of target, one of 'science', 'sky_boss', 'standard_boss', 'sky_apogee', and 'standard_apogee'

within.name: WITHIN
within.description: target is covered by a robot with right fiber type

incadence.name: INCADENCE
incadence.description: target is observable in field cadence (all 0 in this file)

hdu2.name: ASSIGN
hdu2.description: Assignments for each target for each exposure. Entries are in same order as TARGET HDU.

assigned.name: ASSIGNED
assigned.description: Set to 1 if this RSID was explicitly assigned in any exposure (that is, if any value of robotID is not -1)

satisfied.name: SATISFIED
satisfied.description: Set to 1 if the desired cadence for this RSID is satisfied by the planned observations in this file; even if those observations are not explicitly assigned for this RSID, for example if there are other RSIDs with the same CATALOGID requiring a compatible observation.

nexps.name: NEXPS
nexps.description: Total number of exposures that can be applied for this RSID, even if not explicitly assigned to it

nepochs.name: NEPOCHS
nepochs.description: Total number of epochs that can be applied for this RSID, even if not explicitly assigned to it

allowed.name: ALLOWED
allowed.description: For each exposure, whether this target is allowed to be observed based on the design mode for the exposure

robotID.name: ROBOTID
robotID.description: robotIDs explicitly assigned to this RSID for each exposure (-1 if no assignment)

holeID.name: HOLEID
holeID.description: hole ID names for explicit assignments for each exposure

equivRobotID.name: EQUIVROBOTID
equivRobotID.description: set to robotID assigned in each exposure that satisfies the desired CATALOGID, FIBERTYPE, DELTA_RA, DELTA_DEC, and LAMBDA_EFF for this RSID (-1 for nothing assigned).

target_skybrightness.name: TARGET_SKYBRIGHTNESS
target_skybrightness.description: Maximum sky brightness for each target in each assigned exposure.

field_skybrightness.name: FIELD_SKYBRIGHTNESS
field_skybrightness.description: Maximum sky brightness for the field in each exposure.

fiberType.name: FIBERTYPE
fiberType.description: Fiber type assigned (should be same as corresponding field in TARGET HDU)

boss_n_skies_min.name: BOSS_N_SKIES_MIN
boss_n_skies_min.description: Minimum number of skies for BOSS

apogee_n_skies_min.name: APOGEE_N_SKIES_MIN
apogee_n_skies_min.description: Minimum number of skies for APOGEE

boss_min_skies_fovmetric.name: BOSS_MIN_SKIES_FOVMETRIC
boss_min_skies_fovmetric.description: Minimum FOV metric for BOSS skies

apogee_min_skies_fovmetric.name: APOGEE_MIN_SKIES_FOVMETRIC
apogee_min_skies_fovmetric.description: Minimum FOV metric for APOGEE skies

boss_n_stds_min.name: BOSS_N_STDS_MIN
boss_n_stds_min.description: Minimum number of standards for BOSS

apogee_n_stds_min.name: APOGEE_N_STDS_MIN
apogee_n_stds_min.description: Minimum number of standards for APOGEE

boss_min_stds_fovmetric.name: BOSS_MIN_STDS_FOVMETRIC
boss_min_stds_fovmetric.description: Minimum FOV metric for BOSS standards

apogee_min_stds_fovmetric.name: APOGEE_MIN_STDS_FOVMETRIC
apogee_min_stds_fovmetric.description: Minimum FOV metric for APOGEE standards

boss_stds_mags.name: BOSS_STDS_MAGS
boss_stds_mags.description: Minimum and maximum magnitude for BOSS standard in (g, r, i, BP, G, RP, H)

apogee_stds_mags.name: APOGEE_STDS_MAGS
apogee_stds_mags.description: Minimum and maximum magnitude for APOGEE standard in (g, r, i, BP, G, RP, H)

boss_bright_limit_targets.name: BOSS_BRIGHT_LIMIT_TARGETS
boss_bright_limit_targets.description: Minimum and maximum magnitude for BOSS target in (g, r, i, BP, G, RP, H)

apogee_bright_limit_targets.name: APOGEE_BRIGHT_LIMIT_TARGETS
apogee_bright_limit_targets.description: Minimum and maximum magnitude for APOGEE target in (g, r, i, BP, G, RP, H)

apogee_trace_diff_targets.name: APOGEE_TRACE_DIFF_TARGETS
apogee_trace_diff_targets.description: maximum difference in H mag for targets neighboring on slit

hasBoss.name: HASBOSS
hasBoss.description: Set if this robot carries a BOSS fiber

hasApogee.name: HASAPOGEE
hasApogee.description: Set if this robot carries an APOGEE fiber

rsid.name: RSID
rsid.description: RSID of target assigned to this robot for each exposure (-1 if none)

itarget.name: ITARGET
itarget.description: position (0-indexed) of RSID assigned in TARGET and ASSIGN HDUs

catalogid.name: CATALOGID
catalogid.description: CATALOGID (from targetdb) of the RSID for this exposure

fiberType.name: FIBERTYPE
fiberType.description: Fiber types used for each exposure
